attributes.action: enact laws restricting the usage of unsolicited direct mail campaigns.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Direct mail campaigns are - in all their forms - an intrusive component of advertising, which is regularly forced into our households. There should be a point where citizens are legally permitted to refuse these items. It is a wasteful and invasive practice, yet still, these items are being littered into people’s homes daily.
